entry.title: A visual comparison of votes for two carbon tax initiatives
entry.content:
In 2016 and 2018, Washington State voters were presented two different carbon tax measures in the General Election. A full comparison of both proposals is here. While neither passed, I was curious how the Yes vote looked for both Propositions.

Map of percentage of Yes votes for Initiative 732 (General Election 2016):

(Hover mouse over county for exact percentage)

Map of percentage of Yes votes for Initiative 1631 (General Election 2018):

Hover mouse over county for percentage.

Overall net change in Yes votes from Initiative 732 to Initiative 1631 as a percentage of the whole by County. The more red counties are where Initiative 732 was favored more while the more blue counties are where Initiative 1631 was favored more.

(Hover mouse over county for percentage)
